title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 25
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 25
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Evertec (EVTC). Evertec Inc.'s shares fell to a record low as the Puerto Rico- based payment processor dealt with the aftermath of Hurricane Maria. Evertec is one of only six publicly traded companies headquartered on the island and valued at more than $250 million, according to data compiled by Bloomberg. The company's share price has tumbled as much as 16 percent since Tuesday, when Maria was approaching Puerto Rico.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
